channel.title: Pamela Anderson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘Bad Guys 2’ Scores $2.6M in Previews, Liam Neeson’s ‘Naked Gun’ Loads Up With $1.6M
item.description: The two films — along with Neon’s gruesome horror-comedy ‘Together’ — are going up against holdovers ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ and ‘Superman’ at the early August box office.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Bad Guys 2’ Scores $2.6M in Previews, Liam Neeson’s ‘Naked Gun’ Loads Up With $1.6M
item.description: The two films — along with Neon’s gruesome horror-comedy ‘Together’ — are going up against holdovers ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ and ‘Superman’ at the early August box office.

item.title: ‘The Naked Gun’: What the Critics Are Saying
item.description: The comedic police procedural reboot starring Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson hits theaters on Friday.

item.description: The comedic police procedural reboot starring Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson hits theaters on Friday.

item.title: ‘The Naked Gun’ Review: Liam Neeson Skewers Himself in an Engaging Goofball Grab Bag of a Reboot That Rarely Shocks You Into Laughter
item.description: What it won’t do the way these films once used to is to shock you into laughter.

item.title: Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson Gush About Their Team-Up in ‘The Naked Gun’: “So Much Fun”
item.description: The two star in a continuation of the comedy franchise, which premiered in NYC on Monday.

item.title: ‘The Naked Gun’: First Reactions From the Premiere
